A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So disappointed\, annoying \"jokes\" all the way through\, not a single serious moment allowed to settle before another gag mixed in with tedious subplots. Every question I had going in had a poor conclusion. A speech from Luke to Rey about what the force really is\, which the film then completely ignores. I saw double screening with TFA shown first and for a next chapter\, this felt all wrong. First time I have ever left cinema from a new SW film and not wanted to see it again straight away.
